item.title: Man dies days after being charged in 1973 killing of Connecticut woman
item.description: Police charged George Legere, 77, with murder after he confessed to fatally stabbing 21-year-old Janet Couture in her East Hartford apartment.

item.title: Tropical Storm Jerry churns over central Atlantic Ocean
item.description: Tropical Storm Jerry continued to churn over the tropical waters of the central Atlantic Ocean and was likely to become a hurricane.

item.title: Soldiers investigated after 6 people shot dead on highway
item.description: Numerous violent clashes involving security forces in Tamaulipas have prompted accusations of extrajudicial killings.

item.title: Ex-FBI chief James Comey in court today for arraignment â€” here's what to expect
item.description: Former FBI Director James Comey, a longtime foe of President Trump, will appear in Virginia for an arraignment, in his first court appearance since be...

item.title: Bear injures 2 in Japanese grocery store, man killed in separate attack
item.description: As Japan faces rising human-bear encounters, an animal trapped in a grocery store injured two men, while a separate reported mauling proved fatal.
